sections.name: 0-Level Summoner Words
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Words of Power/Class Word Lists/Summoner Words/0-Level Summoner Words

sections.name: 1st-Level Summoner Words
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Words of Power/Class Word Lists/Summoner Words/1st-Level Summoner Words

sections.body: Accelerate (Time), Decelerate (Time), Disappear (Concealing), Energy Resistance (Body), Enhance Form (Body), Float (Flight), Sense Hidden (Detection), Sense Thoughts (Detection), Servitor II (Summoning), Suppress (Dispelling)
sections.name: 2nd-Level Summoner Words
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Words of Power/Class Word Lists/Summoner Words/2nd-Level Summoner Words

sections.name: 3rd-Level Summoner Words
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Words of Power/Class Word Lists/Summoner Words/3rd-Level Summoner Words

sections.body: Borrow Future (Time), Disappear* (Concealing), Fire Wall (Wall), Ice Wall (Wall), Perfect Form (Body), Servitor VI (Summoning)
sections.name: 4th-Level Summoner Words
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Words of Power/Class Word Lists/Summoner Words/4th-Level Summoner Words

sections.body: Blade Wall (Wall), Cinder Storm (Fire), Dimensional Jump (Teleportation), Nature's Command (Animal), Paralyze Creature (Binding), Servitor VII (Summoning), Stone Wall (Wall)
sections.name: 5th-Level Summoner Words
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Words of Power/Class Word Lists/Summoner Words/5th-Level Summoner Words

sections.body: Energy Immunity (Body), Permanent Paralysis (Binding), Repulse (Gravity), Resist Arcana (Dispelling), Sense Hidden* (Detection), Servitor IX (Summoning), Unmake (Dispelling)
sections.name: 6th-Level Summoner Words
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Words of Power/Class Word Lists/Summoner Words/6th-Level Summoner Words
